snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『ギミック！EXACT☆MIX』| Gimmick! EXACT☆MIX for Arcades | Attract Video
snippet.description:
Gimmick! EXACT☆MIX for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1
Genre: Action
Monitor: Horizontal (Recommended), Vertical
Languages: English, Japanese

FEATURES

COMPLETE 2D REMAKE
The cult action platformer classic returns with lovingly drawn traditional Japanese style 2D pixel art designed for a modern full widescreen format. From the game opening, to the stages and every ending, experience the new 16 bit style remix of Gimmick!

NEW ARRANGED SOUNDTRACK
Supervised by the original game's composer, Masashi Kageyama, popular music composer and Gimmick! fan, Manabu Namiki, has created an all new masterpiece arranged soundtrack. 

0.5 FRAME INPUT LAG RESPONSE -  Twice as fast as the original! The fastest benchmark in the game industry
Maximum Performance! Play like you're meant to. Never miss a jump again.

PERFECT GAME DESIGN
Considered by genre fans as one of the ultimate action platform games. Every single trick and technique are perfectly laid out to be the same* as the original. Challenge yourself to find all of the treasures and reach the secret ending in record time in the new Time Attack mode!  *Item order and extends have been changed for arcade operations.

PLAY IN CLASSIC MODE
You can also select to play through the game with the original version's graphics and an HD audio version of the influential original soundtrack!

OPERATE IN LANDSCAPE OR PORTRAIT
Works in either screen orientation (vertical or horizontal).

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/3NV55rl
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
ジャンプアクション
『ギミック！EXACT☆MIX』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/3NTWjtQ
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 30 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA


Gimmick! EXACT☆MIX | Attract Video | exA-Arcadia
https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia
